Name: Bat
Description: The bat is the lowest level mob and can be found in Brightleaf, close to the starting area.

Name: Slime
Description: The slime is a level 4 creature found in the fields of Brightleaf.

Name: Fishing spider
Description: The fishing spider is a level 8 creature found near the lakes in Brightleaf.

Name: Mushroom
Description: Mushrooms are level 10 creatures that are found on an isolated island - Mushroom Island - only reachable through the Teleporter found nearby the Slime spawns.

Name: Forest spider
Description: The forest spider is a level 12 creature found in the forests of Brightleaf and the Wasteland.

Name: Forest bat
Description: The forest bat is a level 15 creature found in the forests of Brightleaf.

Name: Snow bat
Description: The snow bat is a level 18 creature found in the frozen world of Wintermist.

Name: Ice slime
Description: The ice slime is a level 21 creature found in the frozen world of Wintermist.

Name: Snowman
Description: The snowman is a level 25 creature found in the frozen world of Wintermist.

Name: Ice spider
Description: The ice spider is a level 28 creature found in the cold of Wintermist.

Name: Skeletal snake
Description: The skeletal snake is a level 30 creature found in the dust of the Wasteland.

Name: Cave spider
Description: The Cave spider is a level 34 creature found in the dark corners of the Abandoned Mine.

Name: Skeletal bat
Description: The skeletal bat is a level 35 creature found in the dust of the Wasteland.

Name: Cave Bat
Description: The Cave bat is a level 43 creature found in the dark corners of the Abandoned Mine.

Name: Ice fiend
Description: The Ice fiend is a level 47 creature found in Wintermist, just below the area of the Snowmen.

Name: Raptor
Description: Raptors are medium-leveled dinosaurs that can be found South-West of Brightleaf, traveling from the spawn area to the East, and following the path South.

Name: Forest fiend

Status.Found: South of the slimes, in the forests of Brightleaf

Description: The Forest fiend is a level 53 creature found in the forests of Brightleaf.

Name: Rock fiend
Description: The Rock fiend is a level 60 creature found in the dark corners of the Abandoned Mine.

Name: Giant hornet
Description: Giant Hornets have a Vicious sting and will not stop till either you are they are dead.

Name: Luminant slime
Description: The Luminant Slime is a level 65 creature found in the Dark and mysterious land of Varaxis.

Name: Ancient bat
Description: The Ancient bat can be found roaming the tight spaces of The Frozen Tunnels.

Name: Ice raptor
Description: This Monster is found in Southern Wintermist and is known for tearing things apart with its extremly sharp claws.

Name: Spectral flame
Description: The Spectral flame has escaped its cell and is on the loose in The Ancient Prison.

Name: Phantom flame
Description: The Phantom flame has escaped its cell and is on the loose in The Ancient Prison.

Name: Spectral fiend
Description: The Spectral fiend has escaped its cell and is on the loose in The Ancient Prison.

Name: Phantom fiend
Description: The Phantom fiend has escaped its cell and is on the loose in The Ancient Prison.

Name: Ancient cyclops
Description: The Ancient cyclops have taken over the deepest part of The Ancient Prison.

Name: Golemite bat
Description: Golemite bats like to gather in groups. They feel safer together within the dense woods this way.

Name: Golemite fiend
Description: Golemite bats like to gather in groups. They feel safer together within the dense woods this way.

Name: Baby dragon
Description:
Baby Dragons are scattered throughout Umbra's Lair. They don't attack like normal monsters do, they shoot fire balls resulting in Ranged damage and can cause a Burn Effect. 
Baby Dragon burn damage is only 100 Burn damage per Second for 10 seconds.

Name: War bat

Status.Found: Inside the War Bat Dungeon, entered with a Bat Orb m.png Bat Orb.

Description: The War Bat is a large bat found in a dark cave, which can be entered through the tombstone found north of Brightleaf. To enter the dungeon, you need a Bat Orb which can be obtained from either Bats or Forest bats.

Name: Rock Demon
Description: The Rock Demon is a Boss found in the Abandoned Mine's and has a small percent chance of spawning when a player kills a Rock fiend.

Name: Ancient War Bat
Description: The Ancient War Bat is a Boss that can be found in The Frozen Tunnels. It is known for being the only place to obtain the chilly Glacial Helm, Glacial Body, and Glacial Legs.

Name: Ice Demon
Description: The Ice Demon is a Boss that can be found in the Ancient Prison. Entering the boss chamber costs a fee of 5,000 Gold. It is known for being the only source of the powerful Phantom Helm and Spectral Helm's.

Name: Golem
Description: The Golem is a Boss that can be found in the Temple of Varaxis. Watchout for falling ceilings! . The Golem drops many different Boss Parts that can be crafted into very powerful level 85 armor at 65 smithing.

Name: Umbra
Description: Umbra, Guardian of Varaxis is a Boss that can be found in Umbra's Lair. Watchout for Dragonfire! . Umbra drops many different Boss Parts that can be crafted into very powerful level 90 armor at 70 smithing. (This armor is untradable after crafting)
